unnormalised: Namaste, folks! Seems like this Diwali might pinch the pocket a little extra, especially if auntyji is planning a massive mithai spread. Gas cylinder prices have seen another hike, reportedly jumping by Rs. 50 per cylinder across the board.
normalised: Namaste, folks! Seems like this Diwali might pinch the pocket a little extra, especially if auntyji is planning a massive mithai spread. Gas cylinder prices have seen another hike, reportedly jumping by rupees fifty per cylinder across the board.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Petroleum Ministry claims this is due to global market fluctuations – something about Brent crude doing the chaal of a snake charmer, apparently.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Petroleum Ministry claims this is due to global market fluctuations – something about Brent crude doing the chaal of a snake charmer, apparently.

unnormalised: This latest jump means a standard 14.2 kg cylinder will now set you back by roughly Rs. 1150 in Delhi, and even more in places like Chennai.
normalised: This latest jump means a standard fourteen point two kilogram cylinder will now set you back by roughly rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty in Delhi, and even more in places like Chennai.

unnormalised: Folks in Mumbai are already complaining, saying their monthly budget is tighter than a dhoti in a monsoon.
normalised: Folks in Mumbai are already complaining, saying their monthly budget is tighter than a dhoti in a monsoon.

unnormalised: Restaurant owners, especially those running small dhabas in Chandni Chowk, are worried too. They're saying margins are thinner than a papadum already!
normalised: Restaurant owners, especially those running small dhabas in Chandni Chowk, are worried too. They are saying margins are thinner than a papadum already!

unnormalised: Some analysts are predicting even more hikes before the year end. Time to dust off those old chulhas in the backyard? Kidding! (mostly). Maybe just a slightly smaller Diwali gathering in that new 1200 sq ft apartment?
normalised: Some analysts are predicting even more hikes before the year end. Time to dust off those old chulhas in the backyard? Kidding! (mostly). Maybe just a slightly smaller Diwali gathering in that new one thousand two hundred square foot apartment?
